ANU.name: Maria Carina Vollmer
expertise: Aboriginal And Torres Strait Islander Languages
Linguistic Structures Incl. Grammar Phonology Lexicon Semantics
interest: Maria is interested in typology, syntax, morpho-syntax and information  structure. She has previously studied and worked on genetically and  areally diverse languages, including Mandarin and Northern  Kurdish. Currently, she is doing a PhD on Warlpiri. She has done corpus studies on ergativity, referential choice  and pro-drop using Multi-CAST (multicast.aspra.uni-bamberg.de).
